description.value: Primary Energy: Space 3 (force armor) Supporting Energy: Time 4 (duration 1 hour) Range: self, touch Duration: 1 hour Total Cost: 7 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Space Potential + Space Mastery + Time Potential + Time Mastery Effect: Target at touch gains DR 5 (doesn't stack with worn armor). Counts as no armor for purposes of Acrobatic Defense and similar abilities. Applies Effects: dr-bonus (value=5) Saving Throw: None Success Scaling: 1 = 10 minutes, 2 = 1 hour, 3 = 4 hours, 4 = DR 6 (4 hours), 5 = DR 7 (12 Hours)
